name: SMARTTEXT
description: This table contains information relating to SmartText records. SmartTexts are blocks of text which may be used in a variety of ways, including documenting on clinical encounters, and for letters sent to patients.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the SmartText record.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.
